subject: Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Florida State’s Buster Posey won USA Baseball’s Golden Spikes Award, becoming the second catcher to be honored as the nation’s top amateur player. Posey, the Atlantic Coast Conference player of the year, led the N.C.A.A. in batting average (.472), on-base percentage (.572) and slugging percentage (.908).
